version_description: Pieniä parannuksia.
Lisäsimme Nopeusmittarin, joka mittaa mobiilinettisi toimivuutta, esim. nopeuden ja viiveen. Voit tarkastella nopeusmittauksen tuloksia kartalla ja kertoa meille tyytyväisyytesi yhteyteen.
Added support for English and Swedish languages. Language used is determined by setting that the phone is using.
You can now try speed test without having the need to log in.
Small improvements.
Small improvements.
Small improvements.
Small improvements.
Small improvements.
Small improvements.
Logged in customers can now pay their invoices by using the application
Small improvements.
Small improvements.
All customers with Elisa ID can now log in to the application.

What’s new:
• Now you can administer Elisa Viihde and broadband
• Small improvements

We are constantly developing the application from which you will find all Elisa's and Saunalahti's invoices,  you can also manage your mobile and mobile broadband subscriptions.
The application will in future cover all Elisa and Saunalahti services.
Added support for two-factor authentication. The service will be gradually introduced into Elisa's services.
You can check the PUK-codes for your subscriptions and manage usage blocks on a broader scale via the PUK-codes and blocks -view.
Small improvements.
New Subscription information view, through which you can now also easily update your subscription in Elisa’s webshop.

-My Account -view that gives you information on the app settings and also shows your own customer information.
-In the future, you can check the new functions of the app from the About the app -section.

We are in the process of renewing the speed measurement function. Viewing the measurement result history is currently not possible.
Note! Mobiili OmaElisa application is for consumer customers only.

The app has been updated and we have added new features

- Navigating through the app is now easier

- You can manage all your Elisa and Saunalahti products and services

- Familiar functions such as paying invoices and connection speed measurement are still available

- Option to send feedback with the feedback form in the app

- Faster access to subscriptions’ data and call itemisation via the front page
We made some small fixes and improvements.
